property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: The directory where the NameNode stores the namespace and transaction logs.

property.name: dfs.datanode.data.dir
property.description: The directory where the DataNode stores the blocks.

property.name: dfs.namenode.rpc-address
property.description: The address and port for the NameNode RPC server.

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-address
property.description: The address and port for the NameNode HTTP server.

property.name: dfs.datanode.address
property.description: The address and port for the DataNode RPC server.

property.name: dfs.datanode.http.address
property.description: The address and port for the DataNode HTTP server.

property.name: dfs.client.use.datanode.hostname
property.description: Whether clients should use datanode hostnames when connecting to datanodes.

property.name: dfs.datanode.use.datanode.hostname
property.description: Whether datanodes should use hostnames when connecting to other datanodes for data transfer.
